attributes.action: Legalise the use of CBD in flower and leaf form.
attributes.additional_details: With the world moving into a new and modern era, I believe the restrictions on "plants" should change. King Henry VIII supported farmers growing hemp, and in 2020 you can be imprisoned for 5 years for possessing a plant. CBD in controlled form has many proven benefits. The legalisation could also aid in collecting some much needed tax to soften the blow of COVID-19 expenditures.
attributes.background: Legalise CBD in flower form to allow alternative methods of consumption and catch up with the rest of the modern world.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

When this petition was initially rejected we provided some incorrect information on the legality of certain substances, which has now been removed.

If you would like to discuss this petition with us you can email us at petitionscommittee@parliament.uk.
